languages.text: {n}Два скелета лежат в странной позе — будто один нес второго или обнимал, и не разомкнул руки даже в смерти. Снаряжение на скелетах сильно испорчено и истлело.{/n}
{n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Два скелета лежат в странной позе — будто один нес второго или обнимал, и не разомкнул руки даже в смерти. Снаряжение на скелетах сильно испорчено и истлело.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}

{n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}两具白骨以古怪的姿势躺在地上，似乎其中一具在背着或抱着另一具，即便是死亡也无法令其松手。它们身上的装备已经严重损坏、腐朽。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}两具白骨以古怪的姿势躺在地上，似乎其中一具在背着或抱着另一具，即便是死亡也无法令其松手。它们身上的装备已经严重损坏、腐朽。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dos esqueletos yacen en posiciones extrañas. Es como si uno hubiera cargado con otro o lo hubiera abrazado y no lo hubiera soltado ni al morir. El equipo que llevan está dañado y descompuesto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dos esqueletos yacen en posiciones extrañas. Es como si uno hubiera cargado con otro o lo hubiera abrazado y no lo hubiera soltado ni al morir. El equipo que llevan está dañado y descompuesto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}二体の骸骨は奇妙な姿勢で横たわっている。あたかも一方がもう一方を抱えるか、抱き締めるかした状態で亡くなり、いまわの際でさえも離さなかったかのようだ。この二人の装備はひどく損傷しており、腐敗が進んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}二体の骸骨は奇妙な姿勢で横たわっている。あたかも一方がもう一方を抱えるか、抱き締めるかした状態で亡くなり、いまわの際でさえも離さなかったかのようだ。この二人の装備はひどく損傷しており、腐敗が進んでいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zwei Skelette liegen in merkwürdigen Positionen – als hätte eines das andere getragen oder umarmt und selbst im Tod nicht losgelassen. Ihre Ausrüstung ist stark beschädigt und verrottet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zwei Skelette liegen in merkwürdigen Positionen – als hätte eines das andere getragen oder umarmt und selbst im Tod nicht losgelassen. Ihre Ausrüstung ist stark beschädigt und verrottet."

languages.text: {n}Deux squelettes gisent étendus dans une position inhabituelle, comme si l'un portait ou étreignait l'autre et refusait de le lâcher, même après la mort. Leur équipement est complètement délabré et endommagé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deux squelettes gisent étendus dans une position inhabituelle, comme si l'un portait ou étreignait l'autre et refusait de le lâcher, même après la mort. Leur équipement est complètement délabré et endommagé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İki iskelet, yerde tuhaf bir pozisyonda uzanıyor... Sanki içlerinden biri ötekini taşıyormuş veya ötekine sarılıyormuş, ölünce bile bırakmamış gibi. Teçhizatları fena hasar alıp çürümüş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Two skeletons are lying in strange positions — as if one was either carrying or hugging the other and did not let go even in death. Their gear is badly damaged and decayed.{/n}
